# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the button is in an enabled state.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Managing the Button State

- **isSelected**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the button is in a selected state.
